config.script:
try:
		TtableData=self.params.rowData
		system.perspective.print("TtableData-->"+str(TtableData))
		woNo = TtableData.get('Workorder Name')
#		stardDate = TtableData.get('Start Date')
#		enddDate = TtableData.get('End Date')
		lineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
#		deffectedQty = TtableData.get('Defect Qty')
		deffectedQty=0
		
		DefectId = TtableData.get('DefectId')
		partNo = TtableData.get('Part No')
		partRev = TtableData.get('PartNoRev')
#		woQty = TtableData.get('Workorder Qty')
		lineName = TtableData.get('Line Name')
		lineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		self.session.custom.LineID = lineId
		WoStatus = TtableData.get('Workorder Status')
#-------------------Write to Fileds------------------------------------------		
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWONo").props.text=woNo
#		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWOStartDate").props.text=stardDate
#		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWOENdDate").props.text=enddDate
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblLineName").props.text=lineName
		self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericScrapFG").props.value=deffectedQty
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartName").props.text=partNo
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartRev").props.text=partRev
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblDeffectNo").props.text =DefectId
#		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWOQty").props.text=woQty
#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
		woNo=self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWONo").props.text				
		revision=self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartRev").props.text
		partNo=self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartName").props.text	
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
		factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
		scrapByFG=0	
		PEAScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getPEAScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
		self.getChild("root").getChild("TblReportScrap").props.data=PEAScrapHistory
		
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: PEA Scrap Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

system.perspective.print("After Cell Edit ")
	defineKeyColumn = "EI PartNo"
	#----------------- get selected cell value,row number,column number -----------------  
	updatedValue=event.value  
	selRow=event.row  
	selColumn=self.props.selection.selectedColumn
	#-------------------------------------- End ----------------------------------------
	
	#----------------- update data back in existing table dataset ----------------------  
	dtSet=self.props.data
	updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}
	resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)  
	ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)
	self.props.data=ds
	#-------------------------------------- End -----------------------------------------      
	tabldata=self.props.data  
	val=tabldata.getValueAt(selRow, selColumn)
	Components=tabldata.getValueAt(selRow,defineKeyColumn)
	componentData=[val,Components]
	system.perspective.print(componentData)

messageHandlers.script:
try:
		
		scrapVal=payload['value']
		selRow=payload['SelctedRowIndex']
#		system.perspective.print("scrapVal-->"+str(scrapVal))
#		system.perspective.print("selRow-->"+str(selRow))
		updatedValue=scrapVal    
		selColumn='Ok Prod Consumption'
		dtSet=self.props.data    
		updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}    
		resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)        
		ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)    
		self.props.data=ds  
		system.perspective.print("MSG Handler Done-->")  
	except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.print('Exception :msg Handler updatig PEA Scrap Value')
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
			system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno
			system.perspective.print(lineno)
			sys.exit()

try:	
			tableData=self.props.data							
			scrapVal=payload['value']
			selRow=payload['SelctedRowIndex']
			preVal=tableData.getValueAt(selRow, 'Original Requirement')
#			currentVal=tableData.getValueAt(selRow, 'Ok Prod Consumption')
			currentVal=scrapVal
			UpdatedpreVal=(preVal+currentVal)
#			system.perspective.print("preVal-->"+str(preVal))
#			system.perspective.print("currentVal-->"+str(currentVal))
#			system.perspective.print("currentVal-->"+str(currentVal))
	#		system.perspective.print("scrapVal-->"+str(scrapVal))
	#		system.perspective.print("selRow-->"+str(selRow))
			updatedValue=float(UpdatedpreVal)    
			selColumn='Original Requirement'
			dtSet=self.props.data    
			updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}    
			resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)        
			ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)    
			self.props.data=ds
			system.perspective.print("MSG Handler Done For PEA cell Update-->")  
	except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.print('Exception :msg Handler PEA  updatig Cell')
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
			system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno
			system.perspective.print(lineno)
			sys.exit()

config.script:
try:
		woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
#		currentShiftId=ProductionOperatorConsole.getCurrentShiftId()	
#		for i in (currentShiftId):
#			shiftId= i.get("ShiftId")
		selectedLineId = self.session.custom.LineID
		system.perspective.print('selectedLineId ID :' + str(selectedLineId))
		shiftId=Authentication.getshiftId(selectedLineId)
		system.perspective.print('Shift ID :' + str(shiftId) + " || selectedLineId :" + str(selectedLineId))
		prodScrapDetails=self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data	
		rowcount = prodScrapDetails.getRowCount()
		bomComponentDetails=[]
		for i in range(rowcount):
			bomName=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "BOM Name")
			bomItemName=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Item Name")
			bomItemRevision=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Revision")
			scrapByFG=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "ScrapByFG")
			CumulativeScrap1=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "CumulativeScrap")
			addScrap=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Ok Prod Consumption")
			
			Description=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Description")
			UOM=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "UOM")
			unitUsage=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Unit USage")
			CumulativeScrap=float(CumulativeScrap1+scrapByFG+addScrap)
			bomComponentDetails1=		{
								"bomName": bomName,
								"bomItemName": bomItemName,
								"bomItemRevision": bomItemRevision,
								"scrapByUnit":CumulativeScrap,
								"scrapByFG": unitUsage,
								"uom": UOM,
								"description": Description
					}
					
			bomComponentDetails.append(bomComponentDetails1)
			
		system.perspective.print("bomComponentDetails-->"+str(bomComponentDetails))		
		scrapReportResult=ProductionOperatorConsole.reportPEAScrap(woNo,shiftId,partNo,userId,bomComponentDetails)
		system.perspective.print("PEA scrapReportResult-->"+str(scrapReportResult))
		if scrapReportResult==1:
#			time.sleep(2)
			#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text			
			revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
			partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
			partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
			partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
			factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
			scrapByFG=0	
			self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0
			PEAScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getPEAScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=PEAScrapHistory
			MessageText="Scrap Details Saved Successfully."
			updaateStatus=1
#			self.getSibling("BtnViewHistory").meta.visible=1
#			self.getSibling("BtnViewEdit").meta.visible=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
		
		else:
			MessageText="Fails to save scrap details."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Production Scrap Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
		PartName='1999-1010437EN'
		Rev='E'
		Factory='JPE'
		ScrapDetails=ProductionOperatorConsole.getScrapReport(PartName,Rev,Factory)
		self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=ScrapDetails
#		self.view.params.HistoryPage=0
		self.getSibling("BtnViewHistory").meta.visible=1
#		self.getSibling("BtnSave").props.enabled=1
		self.meta.visible=0
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Production Scrap Edit Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
	#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
		woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text			
		revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
		factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
		scrapByFG=self.props.value
		self.view.params.scrapByFG=scrapByFG	
		PEAScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getPEAScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
		self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=PEAScrapHistory
		syestem.perspective.print('Table Refresshed Successfully')
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: PEA SrapBy FG')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

onChange.script:
try:
		#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text			
			revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
			partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
			partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
			partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
			factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
			scrapByFG=self.props.value
			self.view.params.scrapByFG=scrapByFG	
			PEAScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getPEAScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=PEAScrapHistory
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: PEA SrapBy FG on value change script')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

config.script:
#	import time
	try:
#	-------------------------------------Save PEA Details------------------------------------------
		woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
		PEAOkQty=self.getSibling("NumericPEAOkQty").props.value
#		currentShiftId=ProductionOperatorConsole.getCurrentShiftId()	
#		for i in (currentShiftId):
#			shiftId= i.get("ShiftId")
		selectedLineId = self.session.custom.LineID
		system.perspective.print('selectedLineId ID :' + str(selectedLineId))
		shiftId=Authentication.getshiftId(selectedLineId)
		system.perspective.print('Shift ID :' + str(shiftId) + " || selectedLineId :" + str(selectedLineId))
		
		prodScrapDetails=self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data	
		rowcount = prodScrapDetails.getRowCount()
		bomComponentDetails=[]
		for i in range(rowcount):
			bomName=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "BOM Name")
			bomItemName=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Item Name")
			bomItemRevision=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Revision")
			scrapByFG=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "ScrapByFG")
			CumulativeScrap1=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "CumulativeScrap")
			addScrap=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Ok Prod Consumption")
			
			Description=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Description")
			UOM=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "UOM")
			unitUsage=prodScrapDetails.getValueAt(i, "Unit USage")
			CumulativeScrap=float(CumulativeScrap1+scrapByFG+addScrap)
			bomComponentDetails1=		{
								"bomName": bomName,
								"bomItemName": bomItemName,
								"bomItemRevision": bomItemRevision,
								"scrapByUnit":CumulativeScrap,
								"scrapByFG": unitUsage,
								"uom": UOM,
								"description": Description
					}
					
			bomComponentDetails.append(bomComponentDetails1)
			
		system.perspective.print("bomComponentDetails-->"+str(bomComponentDetails))		
		scrapReportResult=ProductionOperatorConsole.reportPEAScrap(woNo,shiftId,partNo,userId,bomComponentDetails)
		system.perspective.print("PEA close scrapReportResult-->"+str(scrapReportResult))
		if scrapReportResult==1:
#			time.sleep(2)
			#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text			
			revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
			partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
			partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
			partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
			factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
			scrapByFG=0	
			self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0
			PEAScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getPEAScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=PEAScrapHistory
			MessageText="Scrap Details Saved Successfully."
#			updaateStatus=1
#			self.getSibling("BtnViewHistory").meta.visible=1
#			self.getSibling("BtnViewEdit").meta.visible=0
#			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
#-------------------------------------------------------Close Defect_--------------------------------------------------------------	
			DeffectID=self.getSibling("LblDeffectNo").props.text
			closeDefectResult = ProductionOperatorConsole.CloseDeffect(DeffectID,PEAOkQty)
			if closeDefectResult==1:		
				MessageText="Defect Saved & Closed Successfully."
				updaateStatus=1
				system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)			
				system.perspective.navigate('/PEA')
			else:
				MessageText="Fails to Close The Deffect."
				updaateStatus=0
				system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
		else:
			MessageText="Fails to Save The PEA Scrap Details."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Production Scrap Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
	#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
		woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text			
		revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
		partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
		factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
		scrapByFG=self.props.value
		self.view.params.scrapByFG=scrapByFG	
		PEAScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getPEAScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
		self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=PEAScrapHistory
		syestem.perspective.print('Table Refresshed Successfully')
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: PEA SrapBy FG')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
